original_text: When he has brought out all his own, he goes on ahead of them, and his sheep follow him because they know his voice.
korean_text: 자기 양을 다 내놓은 후에 앞서 가면 양들이 그의 음성을 아는 고로 따라오되

sentences.original_text: When he has brought out all his own
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 양 모두를 이끌어 낼 때

sentences.original_text: he goes on ahead of them
